channel.description: Recent content in Azure SQL on PowerShell Magazine | For the most powerful community

item.title: Configuring Azure environment to set up Azure SQL Database Managed Instance (preview)
item.description: Azure SQL Database Managed Instance (preview) is a new database service in Azure. This is a fully-managed latest version of SQL Server database engine hosted in Azure and managed by Azure and SQL Server teams.
